00066         template <typename T, precision P>
00067         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P>::tmat3x3()
00068         {
00069                 value_type const Zero(0);
00070                 value_type const One(1);
00071                 this->value[0] = col_type(One, Zero, Zero);
00072                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, One, Zero);
00073                 this->value[2] = col_type(Zero, Zero, One);
00074         }

00104         template <typename T, precision P>
00105         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P>::tmat3x3
00106         (
00107                 T const & s
00108         )
00109         {
00110                 value_type const Zero(0);
00111                 this->value[0] = col_type(s, Zero, Zero);
00112                 this->value[1] = col_type(Zero, s, Zero);
00113                 this->value[2] = col_type(Zero, Zero, s);
00114         }

00116         template <typename T, precision P>
00117         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P>::tmat3x3
00118         (
00119                 T const & x0, T const & y0, T const & z0,
00120                 T const & x1, T const & y1, T const & z1,
00121                 T const & x2, T const & y2, T const & z2
00122         )
00123         {
00124                 this->value[0] = col_type(x0, y0, z0);
00125                 this->value[1] = col_type(x1, y1, z1);
00126                 this->value[2] = col_type(x2, y2, z2);
00127         }

00143         // Conversion constructors
00144         template <typename T, precision P>
00145         template <
00146                 typename X1, typename Y1, typename Z1,
00147                 typename X2, typename Y2, typename Z2,
00148                 typename X3, typename Y3, typename Z3>
00149         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P>::tmat3x3
00150         (
00151                 X1 const & x1, Y1 const & y1, Z1 const & z1,
00152                 X2 const & x2, Y2 const & y2, Z2 const & z2,
00153                 X3 const & x3, Y3 const & y3, Z3 const & z3
00154         )
00155         {
00156                 this->value[0] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x1), value_type(y1), value_type(z1));
00157                 this->value[1] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x2), value_type(y2), value_type(z2));
00158                 this->value[2] = col_type(static_cast<T>(x3), value_type(y3), value_type(z3));
00159         }

00161         template <typename T, precision P>
00162         template <typename V1, typename V2, typename V3>
00163         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P>::tmat3x3
00164         (
00165                 tvec3<V1, P> const & v1,
00166                 tvec3<V2, P> const & v2,
00167                 tvec3<V3, P> const & v3
00168         )
00169         {
00170                 this->value[0] = col_type(v1);
00171                 this->value[1] = col_type(v2);
00172                 this->value[2] = col_type(v3);
00173         }

00370         {
00371                 return (*this = *this * detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat3x3, T, P>::call(m));

00407 
00408         template <typename T, precision P>
00409         struct compute_inverse<detail::tmat3x3, T, P>
00410         {
00411                 static detail::tmat3x3<T, P> call(detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m)
00412                 {
00413                         T OneOverDeterminant = static_cast<T>(1) / (
00414                                 + m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2])
00415                                 - m[1][0] * (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2])
00416                                 + m[2][0] * (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]));
00417 
00418                         detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Inverse(detail::tmat3x3<T, P>::_null);
00419                         Inverse[0][0] = + (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00420                         Inverse[1][0] = - (m[1][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[1][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00421                         Inverse[2][0] = + (m[1][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[1][1]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00422                         Inverse[0][1] = - (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00423                         Inverse[1][1] = + (m[0][0] * m[2][2] - m[2][0] * m[0][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00424                         Inverse[2][1] = - (m[0][0] * m[2][1] - m[2][0] * m[0][1]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00425                         Inverse[0][2] = + (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00426                         Inverse[1][2] = - (m[0][0] * m[1][2] - m[1][0] * m[0][2]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00427                         Inverse[2][2] = + (m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1]) * OneOverDeterminant;
00428 
00429                         return Inverse;
00430                 }
00431         };
00432 
00433         template <typename T, precision P>
00434         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> compute_inverse_mat3(tmat3x3<T, P> const & m)
00435         {
00436                 T S00 = m[0][0];
00437                 T S01 = m[0][1];
00438                 T S02 = m[0][2];
00439 
00440                 T S10 = m[1][0];
00441                 T S11 = m[1][1];
00442                 T S12 = m[1][2];
00443 
00444                 T S20 = m[2][0];
00445                 T S21 = m[2][1];
00446                 T S22 = m[2][2];
00447 /*
00448                 tmat3x3<T, P> Inverse(
00449                         + (S11 * S22 - S21 * S12),
00450                         - (S10 * S22 - S20 * S12),
00451                         + (S10 * S21 - S20 * S11),
00452                         - (S01 * S22 - S21 * S02),
00453                         + (S00 * S22 - S20 * S02),
00454                         - (S00 * S21 - S20 * S01),
00455                         + (S01 * S12 - S11 * S02),
00456                         - (S00 * S12 - S10 * S02),
00457                         + (S00 * S11 - S10 * S01));
00458 */
00459                 tmat3x3<T, P> Inverse(
00460                         S11 * S22 - S21 * S12,
00461                         S12 * S20 - S22 * S10,
00462                         S10 * S21 - S20 * S11,
00463                         S02 * S21 - S01 * S22,
00464                         S00 * S22 - S02 * S20,
00465                         S01 * S20 - S00 * S21,
00466                         S12 * S01 - S11 * S02,
00467                         S10 * S02 - S12 * S00,
00468                         S11 * S00 - S10 * S01);
00469 
00470                 T Determinant = 
00471                         + S00 * (S11 * S22 - S21 * S12)
00472                         - S10 * (S01 * S22 - S21 * S02)
00473                         + S20 * (S01 * S12 - S11 * S02);
00474 
00475                 Inverse /= Determinant;
00476                 return Inverse;
00477         }

00585 
00586         template <typename T, precision P> 
00587         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type operator* 
00588         (
00589                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m, 
00590                 typename tmat3x3<T, P>::row_type const & v
00591         )
00592         {
00593                 return typename tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type(
00594                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[1][0] * v.y + m[2][0] * v.z,
00595                         m[0][1] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y + m[2][1] * v.z,
00596                         m[0][2] * v.x + m[1][2] * v.y + m[2][2] * v.z);
00597         }
00598 
00599         template <typename T, precision P> 
00600         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x3<T, P>::row_type operator* 
00601         (
00602                 typename tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type const & v, 
00603                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00604         )
00605         {
00606                 return typename tmat3x3<T, P>::row_type(
00607                         m[0][0] * v.x + m[0][1] * v.y + m[0][2] * v.z,
00608                         m[1][0] * v.x + m[1][1] * v.y + m[1][2] * v.z,
00609                         m[2][0] * v.x + m[2][1] * v.y + m[2][2] * v.z);
00610         }
00611 
00612         template <typename T, precision P> 
00613         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> operator* 
00614         (
00615                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1, 
00616                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00617         )
00618         {
00619                 T const SrcA00 = m1[0][0];
00620                 T const SrcA01 = m1[0][1];
00621                 T const SrcA02 = m1[0][2];
00622                 T const SrcA10 = m1[1][0];
00623                 T const SrcA11 = m1[1][1];
00624                 T const SrcA12 = m1[1][2];
00625                 T const SrcA20 = m1[2][0];
00626                 T const SrcA21 = m1[2][1];
00627                 T const SrcA22 = m1[2][2];
00628 
00629                 T const SrcB00 = m2[0][0];
00630                 T const SrcB01 = m2[0][1];
00631                 T const SrcB02 = m2[0][2];
00632                 T const SrcB10 = m2[1][0];
00633                 T const SrcB11 = m2[1][1];
00634                 T const SrcB12 = m2[1][2];
00635                 T const SrcB20 = m2[2][0];
00636                 T const SrcB21 = m2[2][1];
00637                 T const SrcB22 = m2[2][2];
00638 
00639                 tmat3x3<T, P> Result(tmat3x3<T, P>::_null);
00640                 Result[0][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB00 + SrcA10 * SrcB01 + SrcA20 * SrcB02;
00641                 Result[0][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB00 + SrcA11 * SrcB01 + SrcA21 * SrcB02;
00642                 Result[0][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB00 + SrcA12 * SrcB01 + SrcA22 * SrcB02;
00643                 Result[1][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB10 + SrcA10 * SrcB11 + SrcA20 * SrcB12;
00644                 Result[1][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB10 + SrcA11 * SrcB11 + SrcA21 * SrcB12;
00645                 Result[1][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB10 + SrcA12 * SrcB11 + SrcA22 * SrcB12;
00646                 Result[2][0] = SrcA00 * SrcB20 + SrcA10 * SrcB21 + SrcA20 * SrcB22;
00647                 Result[2][1] = SrcA01 * SrcB20 + SrcA11 * SrcB21 + SrcA21 * SrcB22;
00648                 Result[2][2] = SrcA02 * SrcB20 + SrcA12 * SrcB21 + SrcA22 * SrcB22;
00649                 return Result;
00650         }
00651 
00652         template <typename T, precision P>
00653         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat2x3<T, P> operator*
00654         (
00655                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1,
00656                 tmat2x3<T, P> const & m2
00657         )
00658         {
00659                 return tmat2x3<T, P>(
00660                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00661                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00662                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2],
00663                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00664                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00665                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2]);
00666         }
00667 
00668         template <typename T, precision P>
00669         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat4x3<T, P> operator*
00670         (
00671                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1,
00672                 tmat4x3<T, P> const & m2
00673         )
00674         {
00675                 return tmat4x3<T, P>(
00676                         m1[0][0] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[0][2],
00677                         m1[0][1] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[0][2],
00678                         m1[0][2] * m2[0][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[0][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[0][2],
00679                         m1[0][0] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[1][2],
00680                         m1[0][1] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[1][2],
00681                         m1[0][2] * m2[1][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[1][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[1][2],
00682                         m1[0][0] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[2][2],
00683                         m1[0][1] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[2][2],
00684                         m1[0][2] * m2[2][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[2][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[2][2],
00685                         m1[0][0] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][0] * m2[3][1] + m1[2][0] * m2[3][2],
00686                         m1[0][1] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][1] * m2[3][1] + m1[2][1] * m2[3][2],
00687                         m1[0][2] * m2[3][0] + m1[1][2] * m2[3][1] + m1[2][2] * m2[3][2]);
00688         }

00690         template <typename T, precision P>
00691         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> operator/
00692         (
00693                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m,
00694                 T const & s
00695         )
00696         {
00697                 return tmat3x3<T, P>(
00698                         m[0] / s,
00699                         m[1] / s,
00700                         m[2] / s);
00701         }
00702 
00703         template <typename T, precision P>
00704         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> operator/
00705         (
00706                 T const & s,
00707                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00708         )
00709         {
00710                 return tmat3x3<T, P>(
00711                         s / m[0],
00712                         s / m[1],
00713                         s / m[2]);
00714         }
00715 
00716         template <typename T, precision P>
00717         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type operator/
00718         (
00719                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m,
00720                 typename tmat3x3<T, P>::row_type const & v
00721         )
00722         {
00723                 return detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat3x3, T, P>::call(m) * v;
00724         }
00725 
00726         template <typename T, precision P>
00727         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename tmat3x3<T, P>::row_type operator/
00728         (
00729                 typename tmat3x3<T, P>::col_type const & v,
00730                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00731         )
00732         {
00733                 return v * detail::compute_inverse<detail::tmat3x3, T, P>::call(m);
00734         }
00735 
00736         template <typename T, precision P>
00737         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> operator/
00738         (
00739                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1,
00740                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00741         )
00742         {
00743                 tmat3x3<T, P> m1_copy(m1);
00744                 return m1_copy /= m2;
00745         }

00747         // Unary constant operators
00748         template <typename T, precision P>
00749         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER tmat3x3<T, P> const operator-
00750         (
00751                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m
00752         )
00753         {
00754                 return tmat3x3<T, P>(
00755                         -m[0], 
00756                         -m[1],
00757                         -m[2]);
00758         }

00761         // Boolean operators
00762 
00763         template <typename T, precision P>
00764         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator==
00765         (
00766                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1,
00767                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00768         )
00769         {
00770                 return (m1[0] == m2[0]) && (m1[1] == m2[1]) && (m1[2] == m2[2]);
00771         }
00772 
00773         template <typename T, precision P>
00774         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool operator!=
00775         (
00776                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m1,
00777                 tmat3x3<T, P> const & m2
00778         )
00779         {
00780                 return (m1[0] != m2[0]) || (m1[1] != m2[1]) || (m1[2] != m2[2]);
00781         }
